name: escape from ganymede (gueepo)
description:
I have made this little "broughlike" time and time again, and this time decided to repurpose it for Ludum Dare while I was doing it on my game engine. It's something!! And it's out there!! Made on my own game engine!!

Move around with WASD. That's it.

Kill Monsters (or avoid them), collect flags to increase your score, you take damage every 10 seconds (you have to go fast!!), and go through the portals to escape from wherever you are (idk what ganymede is I just googled places near Jupiter (the planet, not the city in Florida))

game "engine" source code: https://github.com/guilhermepo2/gueepo2D
